My CS 61B Content Page



Topic Review Notes

These notes quickly review over certain topics while emphasizing key concepts to remember, tips & tricks, and some useful examples. This is by no means an exhaustive textbook of 61B information; rather, these were the things I felt were important to remember in order to prepare for the tricks of the test. Click on the topic to check it out!
